messages.title: The local champion for OUR NHS
messages.content: Dominic Graham is the local candidate for OUR NHS. Our local candidate for Parliament.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fighting to end the scandal of mental health discrimination
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are ending that discrimination and are introducing the first ever waiting time standards from April.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: More for Front Line NHS Workers
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Dominic Graham is calling for more to be invested in front line NHS staff rather than increasing senior management roles and their high wages.

issues.health: Dominic is passionate that our National Health Service is there when we need it. Residents have told him of their difficulties in seeing their GP's.

leaflet.personalStatement: Dominic is passionate that our National Health Service is there when we need it. Residents have told him of their difficulties in seeing their GP's.

contactInformation.address: Return to: Rosemary Smith, 26 Newb Road, Mistley, Manningtree C011 2AQ

quotes.text: The Lib Dems have increased the health budget every year and to give £8 billion in extra funding for frontline NHS services in the next Parliament.
The first ever waiting times for mental health treatment are being introduced and £400m is being used to help sufferers get the right support early on.
Services across the NHS have been improved, with more doctors, lowering waiting times and better access to cancer drugs.

images.caption: Dominic Graham with Nick Clegg at The Lakes, Colchester Hospital's mental health department.
